name: midware-pool
description: Tiny module implementing a pool of connect-style domain-agnostic middleware layers. Runs in the browser and node.js
author: Tomas Aparicio

scripts.uglify: ./node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs ./midware-pool.js --preamble "/*! midware-pool v${VERSION} - MIT license - https://github.com/h2non/midware-pool */" --mangle --source-map midware-pool.min.js.map --source-map-url http://cdn.rawgit.com/h2non/midware-pool/${VERSION}/midware-pool.min.js.map > midware-pool.min.js
scripts.browser: npm run browserify && npm run uglify
